shortDescription.en: Your Essential Dev Toolkit — 10 tools. Fast. Beautiful. Free.
shortDescription.fr: Votre boîte à outils dev essentielle — 10 outils. Rapide. Magnifique. Gratuit.

description.en: A web-based developer tool suite featuring 10 essential utilities in a clean, responsive interface. JSON Formatter, Base64 Encoder, Regex Tester, Color Converter, UUID Generator, Timestamp Converter, CSS Unit Converter, URL Encoder, Tailwind ↔ CSS Converter, and Lorem Ipsum Generator. Includes dark/light mode, Cmd+K search, and copy buttons with feedback on every tool.
description.fr: Suite d'outils web pour développeurs, regroupant 10 utilitaires essentiels dans une interface clean et responsive. JSON Formatter, Base64 Encoder, Regex Tester, Color Converter, UUID Generator, Timestamp Converter, CSS Unit Converter, URL Encoder, Tailwind ↔ CSS Converter et Lorem Ipsum Generator. Dark/light mode, recherche Cmd+K, et boutons de copie avec feedback sur chaque outil.

en: 10 essential developer tools in one unified interface
JSON Formatter with syntax highlighting and validation
Base64 Encoder/Decoder for quick data conversion
Regex Tester with real-time pattern matching
Color Converter between HEX, RGB, HSL formats
UUID Generator for unique identifier creation
Timestamp Converter between Unix and human-readable formats
CSS Unit Converter for px, rem, em, vh, vw conversions
URL Encoder/Decoder for safe URL handling
Tailwind ↔ CSS Converter for seamless style translation
Lorem Ipsum Generator with customizable output
Dark/Light mode toggle for comfortable usage
Cmd+K search for instant tool navigation
Copy buttons with visual feedback on every tool
